Document: ## Miscellaneous Recipes -Cuban Carp = Microwave 1 Dough + 2 Cheese Wedges + 1 Chili + 2 Raw Carp Fillets for 15 seconds -Sashimi = Microwave 2 Raw Carp Fillets + 1u Table Salt for 15 seconds -BBQ Ribs = Microwave 1 Skewer + 2 Raw Meat + 5u BBQ Sauce for 15 seconds -Cooked Spaceshroom = Microwave 1 Spaceshroom for 5 seconds -Dried Tobacco Leaves = Microwave 1 Tobacco Leaves for 10 seconds -Dried Cannabis Leaves = Microwave 1 Cannabis Leaves for 10 seconds -Baked Banana Peel = Microwave 1 Banana Peel for 5 seconds
